pageContent: The prostate cancer is a complex pathology involving oncological, functional and psychosocial items. The prostate's center of CHUV harmonize the know-how of urologists, oncologist, radiotherapists and clinical nurses to offer a global management to patients attempts by prostate cancer, from diagnosis to therapy and follow-up.

metaData.source:
The Surgical Management of Prostate Cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29580436/
